inclusion.criterion: Auditory hallucinations on average at least 5 times per day
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Maintained on psychotropic medication at steady dosages for at least 4 weeks before study entry and for the duration of the trial
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac pacemaker implant, or a history of epilepsy, neurosurgery, or brain trauma patients suffering from chronic medical conditions of any sort
exclusion.label: not_met
